rev.desc.rev.desc: update panel pd.exit.check, change condition to:
nullsub($L.action, "NULL") isin {"bad.val", "badval"}
add new panel pd.exit.check
As an Implementer, the generated PD Wrapper workflow should make sure the ruleset on generated workflow working, so that I can easily customize on it
fix the issue that the RAD src code is not update-to-date on Panel ave.problem.1
Changed back to call apm.save.problem
Added a process panel before the panel 'save.problem' (now 'save.problem.1') to handle actions of update and close.
Took out the following lines from the 'start' panel:
$L.mode="add"
$L.bck.act="add"
Rally DE2072
Eliminate the panel 'save.problem' (an apm.save.problem panel)
and substitute it by 'save.problem' (a se.view.engine panel)
panel -> start
added the following lines:
$L.mode="add"
$L.bck.act="add"
Removed "header," from all of the panels in apm.bg.edit.
On the panel stamp, added processing to set the problem.status field to "Open" instead of "Reopened" for an event type of "epmu".
Set $bgedit for use in apm.get.display.format.
In the panel stamp, added: $L.void=fduplicate($file0, $L.file) Also created a new panel run.init to call format.cint. Changed normal/one record exits from stamp to run.init
Set format field on panel "stamp" this way macro's generating emails will not be NULL.
Added "reopen" action.
Added parameter for bad format control validation exit from apm.save.problem.
Removed call to fill.recurse. Should be called in formatctrl based on new $G.background global variable.
when generating the auto-notify callback list schedule record use the notify.format entry in $G.pm.environment for the format - passed as 1 in strings in the schedule record.
Added callback list notification and linked close processing to close processing.
Will now properly set the default assignment group based on category of opened problem

descript.descript: update panel pd.exit.check, change condition to:

add new panel pd.exit.check
As an Implementer, the generated PD Wrapper workflow should make sure the ruleset on generated workflow working, so that I can easily customize on it

$L.mode="add"

Rally DE2072

and substitute it by 'save.problem' (a se.view.engine panel)
panel -> start
added the following lines:

$L.bck.act="add"
Removed "header," from all of the panels in apm.bg.edit.

Set format field on panel "stamp" this way macro's generating emails will not be NULL.
Added "reopen" action.
Added parameter for bad format control validation exit from apm.save.problem.
Removed call to fill.recurse. Should be called in formatctrl based on new $G.background global variable.
when generating the auto-notify callback list schedule record use the notify.format entry in $G.pm.environment for the format - passed as 1 in strings in the schedule record.
Added callback list notification and linked close processing to close processing.
Will now properly set the default assignment group based on category of opened problem
